title: Arnaud Tanguy
text:
Arnaud Tanguy (born January 21, 1976) is a French former professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
He played on the professional level in <a href="Ligue%201">Ligue 1</a> and <a href="Ligue%202">Ligue 2</a> for <a href="SM%20Caen">SM Caen</a>, with his brother <a href="St%C3%A9phane%20Tanguy">Stéphane Tanguy</a>.
After one season in <a href="Championnat%20National">Championnat National</a> for <a href="Racing%20Club%20de%20France%20Colombes%2092">RC France</a>, he retired from football in 2001 to become <a href="Trader%20%28finance%29">trader</a>.
